name: ultimately
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: finally, after a series of things have happened

example.eg: Everything will ultimately depend on what is said at the meeting with the directors next week.
example.egtrans: 一切将最终取决于下周开会和董事们商议的结果。

example.eg: Ultimately, of course, he'd like to have his own business but that won't be for some time.
example.egtrans: 当然，他最终想拥有自己的企业，但那不会很快实现的。

trans_examp.trans_en: used to emphasize the most important fact in a situation
